

- Surface_mesh
  Efficient halfedge data structure for polygon surface meshes 
  http://graphics.uni-bielefeld.de/publications/imr11/ 
  https://openresearch.cit-ec.de/projects/surface_mesh
  LGPL

  
- glad
  Multi-Language GL/GLES/EGL/GLX/WGL Loader-Generator based on the official specs. 
  https://github.com/Dav1dde/glad
  MIT License
  Loader for OpenGL 3.3 Core generated with webservice http://glad.dav1d.de/
